text: NOMINATION FORM FOR THE EMERITUS PROFESSORSHIP Sabancı University full-time permanent faculty members holding the criteria listed in the “Sabancı University Emeritus Faculty Membership” Instruction Letter, may be included in the nomination list, while they are reaching the retirement age.
